name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"93afe77c-ab35-4a0d-9f1e-b996fb12f036","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Class Documentation: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"79ef3ed4-184a-4fa6-9027-7c6b68556ee5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class is the primary model for any identifiable entity within the source code. Whether an object is a local variable, a class, a function, or a data collection (list/dictionary), it is represented as a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This class acts as a sophisticated state container that tracks not only what an entity ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"is","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (its type and namespace) but also its "points-to" history—how its potential values evolve across different lines of code.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8c138b0c-d226-4d8b-9f58-909a48257de8","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"93a5482a-7f36-4c5b-ad35-527c8c650f9c","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Attributes","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b4227929-7150-42cf-8d5b-19204fecceb6","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"fullns","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"str","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): The fully qualified namespace of the definition (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"app.services.auth.User","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e48039b9-6ab5-4029-9ddd-040e39bc52bc","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"def_type","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"str","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): The category of the definition, identifying it as a function, class, list, map, or basic variable.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f9c1f578-3ff0-48af-9a89-5543c2483ec1","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"points","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"list","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): A chronologically ordered heap of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"PointItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" objects representing the definition's value history at specific source lines.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7d02efed-6c97-4cd5-820e-54045572b198","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"bias","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"set","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): A collection of values the definition is "biased" toward. This is used for low-precision tracking or as a fallback set of all values the definition has ever pointed to.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"76d166fb-ddd0-4171-b8bd-249a4c1217ff","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"memo","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"dict","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): A specialized storage dictionary used exclusively for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"LIST_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"MAP_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to track internal elements (keys/indices and their values).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"229c8974-d3b0-4c07-808e-cd7357f9a8bb","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"8206dcc8-1390-488d-a87e-a776d9a9b95b","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Logic Groups","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fd28188e-ec09-4ab2-aaef-477a90ff1e0c","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Identity & Type Classification","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"03861d21-885a-4a97-b98f-ab22c8516e87","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"These methods establish the core identity of the entity. They allow the analyzer to resolve the symbol's name, its location in the project hierarchy, and its capabilities (such as whether it can be invoked as a function).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dc7a7948-cdf3-412e-990e-cfef8b4fd27b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Methods","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_type","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_ns","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"is_function_def","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"is_ext_def","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"is_callable","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5f52636e-a218-4bf8-8e9b-ba2c60a2c2e5","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Value-Flow Tracking (Points)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"82df6002-ce4b-47f7-bbaa-6f5bae9cb004","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"These methods manage the "temporal" state of the definition. Since Python variables are dynamic, these functions allow the engine to record new assignments at specific coordinates (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"rows","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") and retrieve the state that was active at any given point in the execution flow.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a73f7d8a-0a8a-4f6f-b2f6-a2eb183c5541","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Methods","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add_value_point","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_point","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_last_point_value","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"clear_point","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4ead8f42-8e79-4977-9741-106fe483ffcf","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Collection Operations","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c7727607-1f9f-4ac1-9874-aaa0cf7e08a1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"These methods provide field-sensitive analysis for composite types. When a definition represents a List or a Map, these functions allow the system to track exactly what is stored inside the container, mapping specific keys to specific value-flow sets.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9cd585fb-4d4a-4d8b-a4b4-328d7e9522ba","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Methods","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"set_element","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_element","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"del_element","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"533d1cfd-bfc7-4f07-b805-472bcc6a3049","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"99484b10-5e75-40d9-bcbb-877a2fa2f85d","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2cfe34e3-be87-4c44-bccc-b298aab959f7","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The analyzer uses ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to maintain a living history of every symbol in the project.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b4ee64ce-2971-41c1-bba7-150791fe27bf","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"import utils
from points import Definition

# 1. Initialize a definition for a dynamic variable
# Context: 'config' in 'main.py'
config_def = Definition("main.config", utils.constants.MAP_DEF)

# 2. Record initial assignment at line 5
config_def.add_value_point(row=5, values="STDLIB.dict")

# 3. Track internal element changes
# Context: config['timeout'] = 30
config_def.set_element("timeout", "30")

# 4. Record a complete reassignment at line 20
# Context: config = load_custom_config()
config_def.add_value_point(row=20, values="app.loaders.load_custom_config.return")

# 5. Query the state history
# At line 10, 'config' was still the standard dict
point_at_10 = config_def.get_point(10)
print(f"Values at line 10: {point_at_10.points_to}") 

# After line 20, the values reflect the new source
current_values = config_def.get_last_point_value()","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b291f933-9594-43c0-91a0-07042a1996f3","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Insights","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fac74421-fdbe-424d-b1a5-b5ecf9ddc6e1","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Temporal Precision","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": By indexing values by ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"row","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", Jarvis can distinguish between the state of a variable before and after a specific operation, which is critical for accurate vulnerability detection.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3be9766d-9b7b-4b50-ba3b-08c5fab20e6a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Precision vs. Scalability","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"bias","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" mechanism allows the system to switch between high-precision tracking (using line-specific points) and high-performance tracking (using a unified set of all possible values), depending on the global configuration.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"708744e9-82e3-498f-9a24-0afabe0e51d4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Object-Oriented Design","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Inheriting from ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"object","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" but maintaining its own internal ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"memo","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" allows ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to remain lightweight for simple variables while expanding its capabilities for complex data structures like dictionaries.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"84b8e66a-3d37-4170-bed3-737593fdd245","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
